synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Py3P (13.4 mg, 0.05 mmol), CuI (19 mg, 0.1 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried at 75 °C overnight, degassed under vacuum (1 × 10−3 mmHg) and 120 °C for 12 h

synthesis_conditions.preparation: Single crystals of 1 were placed under vacuum for 2 h, then immersed in VOCs vapors for 2 h to give a series of isomorphous crystalline inclusion complexes.
